q443.question: Q3.4 Indicate the degree of identifiability of information/data you will be using in this project. *

q592.question: Q3.5 Describe any ethical considerations relating to the collection and/or use of the information/data in this project.*

q448.question: Q3.6 Identify the source/s of the information/data that you will be collecting and/or using in this project.*

q1641.question: Q3.6.1 Has the data custodian/s, if any, agreed to provide access to the data for use in the proposed research?

q1644.question: Q3.6.2 Provide any supporting letter or material. Optional

q593.question: Q3.7 Describe any ethical considerations relating to the source of information/data as indicated in the response to the previous question.*

q453.question: Q3.8 Was the information/data that you are using previously collected for a purpose other than research?*

q594.question: Q3.8.1 Provide a rationale for your use of information/data for a purpose other than that for which it was originally collected.*

q455.question: Q3.9 Do you plan to disclose any personal information/data in this project to a third party?*

q596.question: Q3.9.1 To whom do you plan to disclose the personal information/data? *

q595.question: Q3.9.2 Describe how you will protect the privacy of the participants and the security of the personal information/data that you will be disclosing?*

q1024.question: Q3.10 How will you protect the privacy of participants and non-participants in any notes and/or publications arising from your research?*

q1025.question: Q3.11 Are there any restrictions on your ability to assure the confidentiality of participants?*

q597.question: Q3.11.1 Describe how you will explain to participants the restrictions on your ability to give them an assurance of confidentiality. *

q459.question: Q3.12 Do you plan to share any individual research results obtained during this research to the participants?*

q598.question: Q3.12.1 Describe any ethical considerations relating to the sharing of individual research results with the participants. *

q599.question: Q3.13 Describe how you will handle any secondary or incidental findings that arise from the analysis of personal information/data. *

q600.question: Q3.14 Describe how the information/data will be stored, accessed, archived and/or destroyed. *

q601.question: Q3.15 Describe any ethical considerations relating to the storage of, access to or destruction of information/data in this project.*

q467.question: Q3.16 Will the outcomes of this project be disseminated to the participants?*

q1405.question: Q3.16.1.1 Describe how the outcomes of the project will be disseminated to the participants, or refer to the relevant section/s of your Project Description/Protocol which deals with this matter. *

q602.question: Q3.16.1.2 Describe any ethical considerations relating to any dissemination of outcomes to the participants. *

q1030.question: Q3.16.2.1 Justify why the outcomes of this project will not be disseminated to the participants. *

q604.question: Q3.18 Describe any ethical considerations relating to the planned or possible future use of information/data in this project. *
